name: Hulkling
text: Descendant of Both Races — Response: After you play a card with the [[kree]] or [[skrull]] trait from your hand, if you share that trait, draw 1 card. (Limit once per round.) "I am Hulkling, the Young Avengers' resident shape- changer."

name: Teddy Altman
text: Kree/Skrull Hybrid — Setup: Put your origin form upgrade into play, Skrull Origin side faceup. Response: After you change origin form, heal 1 damage from Teddy Altman. "So I'm half-Kree, half-Skrull?"

name: Kree Origin
text: Origin form. Permanent. Hulkling gains the [[kree]] trait. Action: Exhaust this card → flip this card. Response: After you spend a [[skrull]] card, exhaust this card → draw 1 card.

name: Skrull Origin
text: Origin form. Permanent. Hulkling gains the [[skrull]] trait. Action: Exhaust this card → flip this card. Response: After you spend a card with the [[kree]] trait, exhaust this card → draw 1 card.

name: Wiccan
text: While you have the [[kree]] trait, Wiccan gets +1 ATK. While you have the [[skrull]] trait, Wiccan gets +1 THW. “You picked the wrong gays to mess with!”

name: Kree Durability
text: Hero Response: After you change form, ready Hulkling and give him a tough status card. "Yeah, these guys aren't as scary without their guns." —Hulkling

name: Kree Ferocity
text: Hero Interrupt: When you make a basic attack, you get +6 ATK for that attack. You may take 2 indirect damage → that attack gains overkill. "I dont Hulk-out, if that's what you mean. At least not any more than most sixteen-year-olds." —Hulkling

name: Shift and Strike
text: Hero Response (attack): After you change form, deal 4 damage to an enemy. If you have the [[skrull]] trait, confuse that enemy. If you have the [[kree]] trait, stun that enemy. "Wow...it worked. I can't believe it." —Hulkling

name: Skrull Infiltration
text: Hero Action (thwart): Remove 4 threat from a scheme. You may take 2 indirect damage → this thwart ignores the patrol keyword and the crisis icon ([crisis]). "I guess it's the Skrull part of me." —Hulkling

name: Skrull Regeneration
text: Hero Action: Ready Hulkling. Heal 2 damage from Hulkling for each resource you overpaid for this card. "Almost healed...that doesn't mean it doesn't hurt." —Hulkling

name: Alliance
text: Response: After you play a card with the [[kree]] trait from your hand, deal 1 damage to an enemy. Response: After you play a card with the [[skrull]] trait from your hand, remove 1 threat from the main scheme. “Male Kree children are conscripted at age nine. Taken and trained to be the best soldiers in all the universe."

name: Ancestors
text: Uses (2 individual counters). Action: Exhaust this card and remove 1 individual counter from it → choose 1 card in your hand or in play. That card gains the [[kree]] or [[skrull]] trait until the end of the round. “She would have been a powerful leader...might well have brought peace to our warring races." —Mar-Vell

name: Changeling
text: Hulkling gains the [[aerial]] trait. Interrupt: When you use a basic power, exhaust Changeling → you get +1 to that power for this use. "What else do you call a kid who's half-Hulk, half-changeling?" —Kate Bishop

name: Emperor Dorrek-Vell
text: While you have the [[kree]] trait, each ally you control gets +1 ATK. While you have the [[skrull]] trait, each ally you control gets +1 THW. "I am Dorrek VIII, the once and future King of Space!" —Hulkling

name: Excelsior
text: Restricted. (Max 2 restricted cards per player.) While Excelsior is ready, Hulkling's basic attacks gain piercing. Resource: Exhaust Excelsior → generate a [energy] resource. "I found this in there. Looks like a sword" —Hulkling

name: Nega Rings
text: Hero Action: Exhaust Nega Rings and spend a [energy] resource → choose a card in your hand and swap that card with a card of your choice in your discard pile. "...these are what is left of Captain Marvel's legacy. All I have of him." —Hulkling

name: Deflect the Blow
text: Hero Interrupt (defense): When you would take any amount of damage from an attack, discard Deflect the Blow and exhaust your hero, prevent all of that damage. "Wow...it worked. I can't believe it." —Hulkling

name: Drunk in Love
text: Action: Confuse your identity → heal 4 damage from it. "I could wish for anything in any world, I could bend reality to all my whims, and when I wake up alone and scared...I only want you." —Wiccan

name: Glorious Flight
text: Play only if you have an [[aerial]] trait. Hero Response: After you defeat an enemy or a side scheme, discard Glorious Flight → ready your hero.

name: Lauri-Ell
text: Response: After Lauri-Ell takes any amount of damage from an attack, give her a tough status card. “Though I was born and bred for war, I have no taste for violance."

name: Mur-G'nn
text: Action: Exhaust Mur-G'nn and deal 1 damage to her → discard the top card of your deck. If that card's printed resource has: [physical] - Ready a card your control. [energy] - Give an identity a tough status card. [mental] - Heal 3 damage from a character. Mur-G'nn to your hand. [wild] - Choose one of the above.

name: Pride
text: Max 1 per player. Action: Exhaust Pride → discard the top card of your deck. If that card is an identity-specific card, add it to your hand. "I am gay. " —Jean-Paul Beaubier

name: Provoked!
text: Hero Response: After you defend against an attack and take at least 1 damage, ready your hero. "Someone is either breaking in or shooting a music video in my apartment." —Hulkling

name: Strength in Otherness
text: Team-Up (Hulkling and Wiccan). Max 1 per deck. Hero Action (attack/thwart): Remove 1 threat from the main scheme and deal 1 damage to the villain for each different card type in your discard pile.

name: Talos
text: Interrupt: When Talos would take any amount of consequential damage, deal that damage to another character you control. “I may be dishonored, but you are in no way honorable enough to fight against me."

name: Laura Green
text: Playing Along — Action: Search your deck for a [[treachery]] card, shuffle your deck and place that card on the top of your deck. (Limit once per round.) "Out of all the planets in the universe… How is it I keep winding up on this one?"

name: Lyja
text: Skrull Spy — Action: Spend up to 1[per_hero] resources of any type → search the encounter deck for a [[treachery]] card for each resource spent this way, shuffle the encounter deck, and place those cards on the top of the encounter deck in any order. "I am now Lyja… The Lazerfist!!"

name: Human Torch
text: Response: After Human Torch leaves play, search the encounter deck for a [[treachery]] card, shuffle the encounter deck, and place that card on the top of the encounter deck. “Man, this has to be my third-worst breakup ever!”

name: Faking Death
text: Hero Action: Shuffle this card into the encounter deck. When Revealed: Choose to either stun or confuse an enemy. [star] Boost: The activating enemy gets -2 SCH and -2 ATK for this activation.

name: Feign Loyalty
text: Hero Action: Shuffle this card into the encounter deck. When Revealed: Discard an attachment with the uses keyword or the text "Hero Action" or "Hero Response" from play. [star] Boost: Draw 2 cards.

name: Hero Appearance
text: Hero Action: Shuffle this card into the encounter deck. When Revealed: The Lyja player deals 4 damage among enemies in play. [star] Boost: The Lyja player deals 3 damage to an enemy.

name: Posing as a Civilian
text: Hero Action: Shuffle this card into the encounter deck. When Revealed: The Lyja player removes 3 threat from among schemes in play. [star] Boost: The Lyja player removes 2 threat from a scheme.

name: New York Bookstore
text: Laura Green gets +2 REC. Alter-Ego Response: After you make a basic recovery, draw 1 card. “Try thinking about your life instead of your image!" —Lyja

name: Lazerfist
text: Lyja gets +1 ATK. Hero Resource: Exhaust Lazerfist → generate a [energy] resource. "Remember how I lost my ability to fire energy blasts? Well, I got it back…" —Lyja

name: Ministerial Tiara
text: Interrupt: When a boost card is turned faceup, if that card has a star icon ([star]) in the boost area, exhaust this card → draw 1 card. "﻿They restored power to my hands… Insulated me against heat and fire… And gave me my old ministerial post back." —Lyja

name: Mole
text: Hero Interrupt: When a [[treachery]] card is discarded from the top of the encounter deck, exhaust Mole → resolve that card's "When Revealed" ability. "I am Skrull in body… and human in soul!" —Lyja

name: Shapeshifter
text: Lyja gets +1 THW. Hero Response: After you play a [[treachery]] event, exhaust Shapeshifter → ready Lyja. "No mere flame cage can hold me! I am now Lyja… The Lazerfist!!" —Lyja

name: Baxter Building
text: Reduce the cost to play this card by 1 if you control a [[fantastic four]] character. Resource: Exhaust Baxter Building → generate a [wild] resource for any player. The Baxter Building is located in Manhattan. It has been home to the Fantastic Four.

name: Fantasti-Car
text: Response: After Fantasti-Car enters play, ready a [[fantastic four]] card. Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust Fantasti- Car → choose a player. That player may shuffle 1 card from their discard pile into their deck.

name: Fantastic Four Member
text:
Play only if your identity has the [[fantastic four]] trait. 
Attach to a friendly character. Max 1 per character.
Attached character gets +1 hit point and gains the [[fantastic four ]]trait.

name: Going Ballistic
text: Hero Action (attack): Discard your hand. Deal 2 damage to an enemy (to a maximum of 6) for each card discarded this way. “This is how I want you, unfaithful wretch, on your knees!” —Lyja

name: Hit the Weak Spot
text: Hero Action (attack): Deal 2 damage to a minion for each icon ([star] and [boost]) in that minion's boost area. This attack gains piercing. “Thank me later! Go!” —Lyja

name: Invisible Woman
text: Invisible Woman takes +1 consequential damage for each revelation counter on the target of her basic power. Forced Response: After Invisible Woman uses a basic power, place 1 revelation counter on the target of that power.

name: Laser Tag
text: Team-Up (Human Torch and Lyja). Max 1 per deck. Hero Action: Ready Human Torch, Lyja, and each [[superpower]] upgrade you control.

name: Mister Fantastic
text: Resource: Exhaust Mister Fantastic and deal 1 damage to him → generate a [mental] resource. “Nothing is ever what it appears... it's the mysteries and the unknown that make life interesting."

name: The Thing
text: Toughness. Action: Discard a tough status card from The Thing and choose up to 2 enemies → deal 2 damage to each of them. “It's clobberin' time!"

name: Crusader
text: Response: After Crusader enters play, choose a player → deal 1 damage to the villain and each minion engaged with that player. Draw 1 card for each enemy defeated this way. “Do you still want to be a super hero?"

name: Jazinda
text: Jazinda does not count against your ally limit. While Jazinda is exhausted, your hero gets +1 THW. “i do not deny it, I simply despise it"

name: Paibok
text: Toughness. [star] Paibok gets +1 THW and +1 ATK for each treachery card attached to him. Response: After a treachery card is discarded, take 1 damage → attach it facedown here (to a maximum of 2). “The time has come for the Super-Skrull to strike!"

name: Skymax
text: Response: When Skymax enters play, shuffle all allies from your discard pile into your deck. “I already lost one home. I will not lose Earth to your petty revolt.”

name: Super-Skrull
text: [star] Super-Skrull gets +1 THW and +1 ATK for each different [[superpower]] card attached to him. Response: After a [[superpower]] card is placed into a discard pile, attach it facedown here (to a maximum of 4). “The time has come for the Super-Skrull to strike!"

name: War Skrull
text: [star] Response: After "Chilly McHotpants" attacks you, draw 1 cards. If you take no damage from that attack, draw 1 card. “I'm going to freeze your pathetic little body, then I'm going smash it into little pieces which I'm going to use to keep my drinks cold."

name: Xavin
text: Interrupt: When Xavin enters play, discard cards from your deck until you discard an event with a "Hero Action" ability. You may resolve that event's "Hero Action" ability. “My name is Xavin, Super-Skrull-in-training."

name: Buddy Training Program
text: Victory 0. X is equal to the villain's stage number. When Defeated: The player who defeated this scheme may give up to X friendly characters a tough status card.

name: Cloning Program
text: Victory 0. When Defeated: The player who defeated this scheme may deal up to 3 damage to each [[skrull]] minion engaged with them. [acceleration]

name: Fickle Alliance
text: Victory 0. When Defeated: The player who defeated this scheme may search the encounter deck for a non-[[elite]] minion and put it into play under their control. (Shuffle.) Treat that minion as an ally with a blank text box (except for [[traits]]). Its THW is equal to its printed SCH and it takes 1 consequential damage . after it thwarts or attacks.

name: Newbie Training
text: Victory 0. When Defeated: The player who defeated this scheme may defeat a non-[[elite]] [[skrull]] minion and draw 1 card.

name: Searching for Powers
text: Victory 0. When Defeated: The player who defeated this scheme may search their deck and discard pile for a card with the [[superpower]] trait and play it, ignoring its resource cost. (Shuffle.)

name: Skrull Military Training
text: Victory 0. Threat cannot be removed from this scheme unless it is being thwarted by a [[skrull]] ally. While this card is in the victory display, its owner's hero gets +1 THW, +1 ATK, and +1 DEF.

name: Stealing For Good
text: Victory 0. When Defeated: The player who defeated this scheme may search their deck and discard pile for an upgrade and add it to their hand. (Shuffle.) Then, they remove threat from a scheme equal to that upgrade's printed cost.

name: Antalya
text: Action: Exhaust Antalya → heal 1 damage from a friendly character. "We can't let fear make us afraid to live."

name: Cadre K
text: Action: Exhaust Cadre K → remove 1 threat from a scheme. “This is Cadre K. They are an... impure segment of the Skrull population. Like the X-Men of Earth, they were born with powers and abilities beyond the Skrull species.” —K'thron

name: Point of View
text: Hero Response: After a [[skrull]] minion is defeated, exhaust "Pool-O-Vision" → draw 1 card (to a maximum of 3) for each [crisis],[acceleration],[amplify], and [hazard] in play. "So you were saying, "P.O.V." stands for "point of view"? Usually. But in my case, it stands for "Pool-O-Vision". —Deadpool

name: Princess Anelle
text: Alliance. X is equal to the total number of players and [[skrull]] enemies in play. Response: After the player phase ends, remove Princess Anelle from the game → skip the villain phase. “She would have been a powerful leader...might well have brought peace to our warring races." —Mar-Vell

name: Skrull Battleship
text: Play only if you control a [[skrull]] ally. Hero Resource: Exhaust Skrull Battleship → generate a [wild] resource for any player. "You know what I am. You've seen what I can do. I wanna be in the Skrull business." —Deadpool

name: Skrull Kill Krew
text: Hero Action: Exhaust Skrull Kill Krew → deal 1 damage to a [[skrull]] minion. If that minion is defeated this way, ready Skrull Kill Krew. “We're the Skull Kill Krew. This is how we do." —Ryder

name: 3-D Man's Goggles
text: Attach to a non-[[skrull]] ally. Interrupt: When attached ally attacks a [[skrull]] enemy, that ally does not take consequential damage. Googles that let him see and fight your kind over half a century ago!" —3-D Man

name: Inhibitor Mask
text: Attach to a [[skrull]] enemy. Temporary. Treat attached enemy's printed text box as if it were blank. "The Inhibitor mask, It's locked on. I, I can't change." —Empress R'Klll

name: Ultimate Nullifier
text:
Attach to a [[skrull]] enemy.
Temporary.
Attached enemy cannot activate.
While Nullifier is attached to the villain, it gains 1[per_hero] hazard icon ([hazard]).

name: Reverting Device
text: Play under any player's control. Each [[skrull]] minion engaged with you gets -1 SCH. "I will prove it… by reverting you to your original form." —Super-Skrull Hero Action: Discard Reverting Device → remove 1 acceleration token from the main scheme. "Googles that let him see and fight your kind over half a century ago!" —3-D Man

name: Skrull Shapeshifter
text: Play under any player's control. Your identity gains the [[skrull]] trait. Interrupt: When you would be defeated, set your hit point dial to 1 instead. Then, discard this card.

name: Sy-Torak Gem
text: Play under any player's control. You get +3 hit points. Your hero gets +1 ATK. Forced Interrupt: When your deck empties, spend [energy] resource. If you cannot, discard Sy-Torak Gem.
